nodes.text: Troxar was a planet located within the Troxar system of the Expansion Region and the Troxan homeworld.

During the Clone Wars, it sided with the Confederacy of Independent Systems. When the planet was invaded by the Galactic Republic, the Troxans appealed to Count Dooku for help. Dooku promised reinforcements and told the delegation to fight on for as long as possible, but in reality he simply abandoned them to their fate while using their sacrifice to tie down Republic forces.
